description: This file defines a View class for a Todo application, handling DOM manipulation and event binding for rendering and user interactions.

classes.name: View
classes.description: A class that manages the DOM interactions for a Todo app, including rendering and event binding.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the View with a template and caches DOM elements.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates the DOM based on the specified command and parameters.

methods.name: bindCallback
methods.description: Binds event handlers to DOM events for user interactions.

methods.name: _clearCompletedButton
methods.description: Updates the clear completed button's display and label.
